name: Fashion For All
description:
Fashion For All is a time management game where the player runs a clothing store that creates clothing for gender nonconforming people using a computer interface. By navigating different screens the player can check their orders, design clothing, make clothing, and deliver clothing to their customers. The game is score based, and each day you get randomly generated orders. See how much you can make in a day!

A project we made in four weeks

Programming
Lucia Hughes (@LuxiExtra on itch.io)
David Silverman

Art
